clues.text: This museum on the Seine was opened to the public in 1793
Its museums include the Gregorian Museum of Etruscan Art & the Room of the Immaculate Conception
During a recent renovation, it moved "The Night Watch" & other works to the Philips wing
This Florence gallery was designed by Vasari to be an office, hence its name
This London art museum opened in 1897, with much of the gallery being a gift from the industrialist for whom it's named

This very old republic within northeastern Italy is famous for its colorful, collectible stamps

rounds.comments: (Alex: In this next category, you will [*] to come up with your response which will be two different words.)

clues.text: A North Atlantic food fish ingests an E to become a system used for secrecy of communication
To expectorate, with an E added, adds to the bitter ill will
To converse in an informal manner, with an E, will violate rules in a game
A synonym for fear adds an E to become cargo transported for pay
A proposal formally made to a deliberative assembly takes on an E to get in touch with 1 of its many types of feelings

rounds.text: Of the 10 largest cities in population in the U.S., 3 are in this state
